author: stas
msg: open_logs and post_config handlers require the Apache::OK return code
or the server aborts, so we need to log an error in case the handler
didn't fail but returned something different from Apache::OK

author: pquerna
msg: * Log Warnings when adding defer accept or an accept filter fails.

author: pquerna
msg: Add support for Linux's TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT.  Sort of like FreeBSD's accept filters, except defer accept isn't documented, anywhere.
